replies.msg:
Main 上路Teemo，玩純AP build d 磨係痛，但前中期對線好難單殺對面fighter，後期團戰又做得唔多嘢。所以我試咗幾場on hit build。大家俾d 意見我可以點改善

Item path
1) Nashor's Tooth
2) Runaan's Hurricane
3) Gluttononus boots / defense boots(depends on matches)
4) Liandry's
5) Hextech Gunblade
6) Void staff / Deathcap (depends on enemy armor)

Runes
1)Fleet footwork
2) Hunter Vamp
3) Regeneration
4) Path finder
究竟wildrift香港幾時先有得玩2021年喇
